briefings.title: FortiGate Authentication Bypass - Patch Ineffective
briefings.excerpt: Critical auth bypass in FortiGate firewalls. Even patched systems remain vulnerable. Attackers can log in as admin without a password using SAML tricks.

briefings.title: Azure Active Directory Token Validation Flaw
briefings.excerpt: Security researchers discovered a flaw in Azure AD token validation that could allow attackers to forge authentication tokens and access protected resources.

briefings.title: Kubernetes API Server Privilege Escalation
briefings.excerpt: A privilege escalation vulnerability in Kubernetes API server allows users with limited permissions to gain cluster-admin access through RBAC misconfiguration exploitation.

briefings.title: AWS S3 Bucket Policy Bypass via Confused Deputy Attack
briefings.excerpt: A critical vulnerability in AWS S3 bucket policies allows attackers to exploit the confused deputy problem to access buckets through cross-account access manipulation.

briefings.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Container Escape via Privileged Pod
briefings.excerpt: Critical container escape vulnerability in Azure Kubernetes Service allows attackers to break out of containers and take control of underlying nodes.

briefings.title: GCP Cloud Functions Code Injection via Malicious Dependencies
briefings.excerpt: Supply chain attack targeting Google Cloud Functions through typosquatted npm packages that inject backdoors during the build process.

briefings.title: Multi-Cloud IAM Token Theft Campaign Targeting Enterprise Environments
briefings.excerpt: Sophisticated APT campaign stealing cloud access tokens from enterprises, targeting AWS, Azure, and GCP environments simultaneously.

briefings.title: Terraform Enterprise Remote Code Execution via State File Manipulation
briefings.excerpt: Critical RCE vulnerability in Terraform Enterprise allows attackers to execute code by crafting malicious state files, compromising entire IaC pipelines.

briefings.title: AWS Lambda Function URL Authentication Bypass
briefings.excerpt: Authentication bypass in AWS Lambda Function URLs allows unauthorized access to Lambda functions that use IAM authentication.

briefings.title: Azure Blob Storage Encryption Key Exposure via Misconfigured Access Policies
briefings.excerpt: Encryption keys for Azure Blob Storage can be exposed through misconfigured Key Vault access policies, allowing data decryption.

briefings.title: GCP BigQuery SQL Injection via External Table Definitions
briefings.excerpt: SQL injection vulnerability in BigQuery external tables allows attackers to execute unauthorized queries through malicious file names.

briefings.title: Kubernetes Secrets Manager Privilege Escalation via RBAC Misconfiguration
briefings.excerpt: RBAC misconfiguration in Kubernetes allows users with limited permissions to escalate and read all secrets in a namespace or cluster.

briefings.title: GitHub Actions Workflow Injection via Malicious Pull Requests
briefings.excerpt: Critical workflow injection vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in CI/CD pipelines through malicious pull requests.

briefings.title: Cisco IOS XE Web UI Command Injection
briefings.excerpt: Active exploitation of Cisco IOS XE web management interface. Attackers creating admin accounts on exposed devices. Disable web UI immediately.

briefings.title: VMware vCenter Server Remote Code Execution
briefings.excerpt: Critical RCE vulnerability in VMware vCenter Server allows unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected systems.

briefings.title: Windows LDAP Remote Code Execution
briefings.excerpt: Critical vulnerability in Windows LDAP service allows remote attackers to execute code on domain controllers. Patch immediately.

briefings.title: Apache Struts Path Traversal Vulnerability
briefings.excerpt: Path traversal vulnerability in Apache Struts allows attackers to read sensitive files from affected servers.

briefings.title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS Authentication Bypass
briefings.excerpt: Authentication bypass in PAN-OS management interface allows attackers to access firewall configuration without valid credentials.

briefings.title: GitLab CE/EE Arbitrary File Read
briefings.excerpt: Vulnerability in GitLab allows authenticated users to read arbitrary files on the server through specially crafted API requests.

briefings.title: Jenkins Script Console Remote Code Execution
briefings.excerpt: Unauthenticated access to Jenkins Script Console allows complete server compromise. Check access controls on all Jenkins instances.

briefings.title: Linux Kernel Netfilter Privilege Escalation
briefings.excerpt: Local privilege escalation vulnerability in Linux kernel netfilter subsystem allows unprivileged users to gain root access.

briefings.title: SonicWall SMA 100 Series SQL Injection
briefings.excerpt: Critical SQL injection vulnerability in SonicWall SMA 100 Series allows unauthenticated attackers to access sensitive data and potentially gain admin access.
